info.sourceTextContent: Volvió a los dos meses, muerto de hambre, mal encarado y peor vestido. Hízose temible para su mujer, a quien golpeaba con el más leve pretexto, y sospechoso a todo el vecindario, que no estaba hecho a ver en aquel honrado suelo holgazanes y renegados de semejante catadura.
info.suspiciousTextContent: He returned after two months, starving, poorly addressed and poorly dressed. Made himself formidable to his wife, whom he beat with the slightest pretext, and all suspect the neighborhood, that was not made to see in this honest soil of such lazy and renegades aspect.
